content:
Proposal for right sidebar, to declutter it a bit:

  • If your realm is big enough relative to your screen that you can't fit everyone, don't show any of the people that are offline (i.e. have white circles)

I feel like it's sometimes interesting to see the green and orange folks, but I've never found the white folks useful on this realm. Thoughts?
Someone wanted an option to toggle the right sidebar a while ago
yeah, I think we should seriously consider that as well, or an option to move the right sidebar into the left sidebar. I think the suggestion above might be good in any configuration though.

Just to put out the extreme position, all I want to see is green. I can somewhat tolerate orange, and I'd be lying if I never looked at orange (but it wouldn't be a big lie). White circles are completely unneeded on a large realm.
